00041 namespace Ogre
00042 {
00049     typedef vector<TexturePtr>::type ShadowTextureList;
00050 
00052     struct ShadowTextureConfig
00053     {
00054         unsigned int width;
00055         unsigned int height;
00056         PixelFormat format;
00057 
00058         ShadowTextureConfig()
00059             : width(512), height(512), format(PF_X8R8G8B8) {}
00060     };
00061 
00062     typedef vector<ShadowTextureConfig>::type ShadowTextureConfigList;
00063     typedef ConstVectorIterator<ShadowTextureConfigList> ConstShadowTextureConfigIterator;
00064 
00065     inline _OgreExport bool operator== ( const ShadowTextureConfig& lhs, const ShadowTextureConfig& rhs );
00066     inline _OgreExport bool operator!= ( const ShadowTextureConfig& lhs, const ShadowTextureConfig& rhs );
00067 
00068 
00079     class _OgreExport ShadowTextureManager : public Singleton<ShadowTextureManager>, public ShadowDataAlloc
00080     {
00081     protected:
00082         ShadowTextureList mTextureList;
00083         ShadowTextureList mNullTextureList;
00084         size_t mCount;
00085 
00086     public:
00087         ShadowTextureManager();
00088         virtual ~ShadowTextureManager();
00089 
00093         virtual void getShadowTextures(const ShadowTextureConfigList& config, 
00094             ShadowTextureList& listToPopulate);
00095 
00099         virtual TexturePtr getNullShadowTexture(PixelFormat format);
00100 
00106         virtual void clearUnused();
00111         virtual void clear();
00112 
00128         static ShadowTextureManager& getSingleton(void);
00144         static ShadowTextureManager* getSingletonPtr(void);
00145 
00146     };
